casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Nathan Norwood NORRIS, Jr. No. 486A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 6, 2005. Nora Henry Hargrove, for Nathan Norwood Norris, Jr. L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of September 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of September 2005."
